metadata.title: PandoraTees Short Sleeve Bodysuit & Cap Set - Little LABron Fan
features: Made in the USA and Imported
The set includes short sleeve baby bodysuit and cap
100% Ring Spun Combed Cotton, super soft fine fabric
The bodysuit is Short Sleeves with 3 snap button closure on bottom
The cap is onesize with band
This is not affiliated with any Team, Team Logo, Sports, Franchise, Groups or Association. Designed and Printed in USA.
description: Adding fun to Everyday wear and those Special days. This Short Sleeve bodysuit and cap are made in 100% ring spun combed cotton. It is made in fine and soft fabric. The bodysuit has binding on neck, sleeve and bottom with 3 button closure. The cap is one size.. The design is printed in Vinyl. Makes a fun gift for baby shower or newborn presents. This is not affiliated with any Team, Team Logo, Sports, Franchise, Groups or Association. Designed and Printed in USA.
